title: Idaho Wheat Production Guide
text:
Welcome to the Idaho Wheat Production Guide. Browse topics on wheat production in Idaho and get the most up-to-date recommendations from wheat experts in Idaho and surrounding region.

title: About
text: The Idaho Wheat Production Guide is intended to be a “one-stop shop” for wheat producers and ag consultants in Idaho and surrounding region. Producers can access the latest research results and production recommendations and download printable booklets. This guide is a project of the University of Idaho, with funding from the Idaho Wheat Commission. Contributors include Idaho and regional researchers.
